description.en-us:
The Vanster Debut series HW City: HW City Works Produced 2014 - Present Designer Fraser Campbell Number BDC73

The Vanster is a depiction of a Japanese-style van. This casting has a 'Greenhouse' roof- a clear plastic roof revealing a large, mid-mounted engine in the cargo bay, as well as a chopped roofline and wide fenders. This casting is in right-hand drive, as is the standard on JDM (Japanese Domestic Market) vehicles.
